items.name: Bam.e
items.description: Noodles, famous convenient Filipino dish for any occasion! It is made with vermicilli and yellow noodles with perfect combination of shredded pork and vegestables.

comments.author: Joy
comments.comment: It is a perfect combination of noodles, vegestables and protein. A complete meal for any time of the day and any occasion!.

items.name: Chicken Livers
items.description: If you haven't tried chicken liver yet, this is a good time to try this dish. You can't go wrong with a boiled and stir-fried with the perfect combinations of seasoning and fresh spices.

comments.comment: A bizzare food that not many people eat, but dare to try and you will be craving for more!
comments.author: Joy

items.name: Pork Ribs Adobo
items.description: Oh so delicious, you would crave for more! Pork ribs simmered with spices and seasonings and then sauteed with garlic, onions and salted black beans.

comments.comment: It is the most popular dish in the Philippines that every Filipino loved to eat!
comments.author: Hanna

items.name: Sauted Bittermelon
items.description: A very healthy bizzare vegestables that people shoudl try and observe the health benefit of this bittermelon. It is mostly found in Asian countries, and imported to some parts of the foreign countries.

comments.comment: It is bitter but it is full of flavor that is coming from the meat and shrimp paste! Good combination!
comments.author: Marie

items.name: Seared Salmon and Shrimp
items.description: Marinated with teriyake sauce and seared seafood serves a very delicious healthy meal!

items.name: Pasta
items.description: Sauteed chicken tenders and organic pasta seasoned with oyster sauce

items.name: Penne
items.description: Sauteed chicken tenders and organic pasta seasoned with oyster sauce

items.name: Tuna Salad
items.description: Tangy fresh tuna, cucumber with seasoned venigar makes this delicious and healthy alternatives

comments.comment: I love the tang to it and the tuna just melts in my mouth!
comments.author: Joy

items.name: Raw green beans
items.description: I have too much in my garden, so I decided to sell. Organic.

comments.comment: Really fresh and taste delicious no matter how you cook it!
comments.author: Joy
